Class VfsFileTransfer

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.installer.filetransfer.VfsFileTransfer
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileTransfer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CifsFileTransfer, SftpFileTransfer
public abstract class VfsFileTransfer
extends Object
implements FileTransfer

A base class for commons-vfs based file transfer.

Since:
2.5.0
Author:
barakme

Copies the required files from the local directory.

Specified by:
copyFiles in interface FileTransfer
Parameters:
details - the installation details.

additionalFiles - additional files to be copied that are not in the local directory.
endTimeMillis - timeout time for this operation.
Throws:
TimeoutException - if the timeout target time is exceeded.
